entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
